basics.name: skuUrnVersion
basics.label: Oracle WebLogic Image
basics.defaultValue: WebLogic Server 14.1.1.0.0 and JDK11 on Oracle Linux 7.6
basics.toolTip: Choose Oracle WebLogic image, which is provided by Oracle, with Java and WebLogic preinstalled.

allowedValues.label: WebLogic Server 12.2.1.3.0 and JDK8 on Oracle Linux 7.4
WebLogic Server 12.2.1.3.0 and JDK8 on Oracle Linux 7.3
WebLogic Server 12.2.1.4.0 and JDK8 on Oracle Linux 7.6
WebLogic Server 14.1.1.0.0 and JDK8 on Oracle Linux 7.6
WebLogic Server 14.1.1.0.0 and JDK11 on Oracle Linux 7.6

basics.name: vmSizeSelect
basics.label: Virtual machine size
basics.toolTip: The size of virtual machine to provision.

basics.name: basicsRequired
basics.label: Credentials for Virtual Machines and WebLogic

elements.name: adminUsername
elements.label: Username for admin account of VMs
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

toolTip.authenticationType: Use username and password or SSH public key for authentication to the VM
toolTip.password: Password for admin account of VMs
toolTip.sshPublicKey: SSH key for admin account of VMs

constraints.customValidationMessage: Password must be at least 12 characters long and have 3 out of the following: one number, one lower case, one upper case, or one special character

elements.name: wlsUserName
elements.label: Username for WebLogic Administrator
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: wlsPassword
elements.toolTip: Password for WebLogic Administrator

constraints.validationMessage: The password must contain at least 12 characters, with at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter and 1 number, and special characters are not allowed.

elements.name: dynamicClusterSize
elements.label: Initial Dynamic Cluster Size
elements.toolTip: Initial Number of Managed Servers that will be configured in the Dynamic Cluster

constraints.validationMessage: Initial Number of Managed Servers that will be configured in the Dynamic Cluster

elements.name: maxDynamicClusterSize
elements.label: Maximum Dynamic Cluster Size
elements.toolTip: Maximum Number of Managed Servers allowed to be configured in the Dynamic Cluster

constraints.validationMessage: Maximum Number of Managed Servers allowed to be configured in the Dynamic Cluster

elements.name: basicsOptionalAcceptDefaults
elements.label: Accept defaults for optional configuration?
elements.toolTip: Select 'No' to edit optional basic configuration.

elements.name: dnsLabelPrefix
elements.label: DNS Label Prefix
elements.toolTip: The string to prepend to the DNS label.

constraints.validationMessage: The prefix must be between 3 and 10 characters long and contain letters, numbers only.

elements.name: managedServerPrefix
elements.label: Managed Server Prefix
elements.toolTip: The string to prepend to the name of the managed server.  Must start with letters and not have a run of more than eight digits.

constraints.validationMessage: The prefix must be between 3 and 20 characters long and contain letters, numbers only.

elements.name: wlsDomainName
elements.label: WebLogic Domain Name
elements.toolTip: The name of the WebLogic Domain to create.

constraints.validationMessage: The Domain Name must be between 3 and 20 characters long and contain letters, numbers only.

elements.name: portsToExpose
elements.label: Ports and port ranges to expose (N or N-N, comma separated)
elements.toolTip: Ports and port ranges to expose (N or N-N, comma separated)

constraints.validationMessage: Only numbers, hyphen separated ranges of numbers, separated by commas

elements.name: denyPublicTrafficForAdminServer
elements.label: Deny public traffic for admin server?
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' to deny public traffic for admin server. Configuration here for port 7001 and 7002 has a higher priority than above.

elements.name: enableAdminHTTPListenPort
elements.label: Enable HTTP listen port on WebLogic Administration Server?
elements.toolTip: Select 'No' to disable HTTP listen port on WebLogic Administration Server.

elements.name: useSystemAssignedManagedIdentity
elements.label: Cause a system assigned managed identity to be created for the VM(s).
elements.toolTip: System assigned managed identities enable credential-free secure access to many Azure resources from this VM.

options.text: Template version ${project.version}

basics.name: howToReportIssues
basics.label: Report issues, get help, and share feedback

options.text: If you encounter problems during the deployment of Oracle WebLogic Server, report them here.
If you want to interact directly with the Oracle WebLogic community, join the public Slack channel named 'oracle-weblogic'.
To get free help with Azure migration from the development team, fill out this survey.
Selecting 'Yes' here will cause the template to provision WebLogic Administration Console on HTTPS (Secure) port, with your own TLS/SSL certificate.

elements.name: enableCustomSSL
elements.label: Configure WebLogic Administration Console on HTTPS (Secure) port, with your own TLS/SSL certificate?
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' to configure WebLogic Administration Console on HTTPS (Secure) port with your own TLS/SSL certificate.

elements.name: sslConfigurationAccessOption
elements.label: How would you like to provide required configuration
elements.toolTip: Select 'Upload existing KeyStores' to use local stored KeyStores.

allowedValues.label: Use KeyStores stored in Azure Key Vault

options.text: You must provide different files for identity and trust KeyStores. Select here for more details.

elements.name: uploadedCustomIdentityKeyStoreData
elements.label: Identity KeyStore Data file(.jks,.p12)
elements.toolTip: Identity KeyStore for TLS/SSL configuration

elements.name: uploadedCustomIdentityKeyStorePassphrase
elements.toolTip: The passphrase for the Identity KeyStore

constraints.validationMessage: Keypass must be at least 6 characters long.

elements.name: uploadedCustomIdentityKeyStoreType
elements.label: The Identity KeyStore type (JKS,PKCS12)
elements.toolTip: One of the supported KeyStore types

elements.name: uploadedPrivateKeyAlias
elements.label: The alias of the server's private key within the Identity KeyStore
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: uploadedPrivateKeyPassPhrase

label.password: The passphrase for the server's private key within the Identity KeyStore

elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: Keypass must be at least 6 characters long.

elements.name: uploadedCustomTrustKeyStoreData
elements.label: Trust KeyStore Data file(.jks,.p12)
elements.toolTip: Trust KeyStore for TLS/SSL configuration.

elements.name: uploadedCustomTrustKeyStorePassPhrase
elements.toolTip: The passphrase for the Trust KeyStore

constraints.validationMessage: Keypass must be at least 6 characters long.

elements.name: uploadedCustomTrustKeyStoreType
elements.label: The Trust KeyStore type (JKS,PKCS12)
elements.toolTip: One of the supported KeyStore types

options.text: You must provide different files for identity and trust KeyStores. Select here for more details.

Enabling a HTTPS (Secure) port for the Administration Console requires you to obtain a valid TLS/SSL certificate. The template will look for the certificate and other configuration items in the Azure Key Vault specified here.

elements.name: keyVaultResourceGroup
elements.label: Resource group name in current subscription containing the Key Vault
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: [if(greater(length(steps('section_sslConfiguration').keyVaultStoredCustomSSLSettings.keyVaultResourceGroup), 90),'Resource group names only allow up to 90 characters.', 'Resource group names only allow alphanumeric characters, periods, underscores, hyphens and parenthesis and cannot end in a period.')]

elements.name: keyVaultName
elements.label: Name of the Azure Key Vault containing secrets for the TLS/SSL certificate
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: [if(or(greater(length(steps('section_sslConfiguration').keyVaultStoredCustomSSLSettings.keyVaultName), 24), less(length(steps('section_sslConfiguration').keyVaultStoredCustomSSLSettings.keyVaultName), 3)),'Vault name must be between 3-24 alphanumeric characters. The name must begin with a letter, end with a letter or digit, and not contain consecutive hyphens.','Vault name must only contain alphanumeric characters and dashes and cannot start with a number')]

elements.name: keyVaultCustomIdentityKeyStoreDataSecretName
elements.label: The name of the secret in the specified Key Vault whose value is the Identity KeyStore Data
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: keyVaultCustomIdentityKeyStorePassPhraseSecretName
elements.label: The name of the secret in the specified Key Vault whose value is the passphrase for the Identity KeyStore
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: keyVaultCustomIdentityKeyStoreType
elements.label: The Identity KeyStore type (JKS,PKCS12)
elements.toolTip: One of the supported KeyStore types

elements.name: keyVaultPrivateKeyAliasSecretName
elements.label: The name of the secret in the specified Key Vault whose value is the private key Alias
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: keyVaultPrivateKeyPassPhraseSecretName
elements.label: The name of the secret in the specified Key Vault whose value is the passphrase for the private key
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: keyVaultCustomTrustKeyStoreDataSecretName
elements.label: The name of the secret in the specified Key Vault whose value is the Trust KeyStore Data
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: keyVaultCustomTrustKeyStorePassPhraseSecretName
elements.label: The name of the secret in the specified Key Vault whose value is the passphrase for the Trust KeyStore
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: keyVaultCustomTrustKeyStoreType
elements.label: The Trust KeyStore type (JKS,PKCS12)
elements.toolTip: One of the supported KeyStore types

options.text: Selecting 'Yes' here will cause the template to provision an Azure Oracle HTTP Server, set up a public IP, and configuration with WebLogic cluster address.  Further configuration may be necessary after deployment.

elements.name: enableOHS
elements.label: Connect to Oracle HTTP Server?
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' to cause an Azure Oracle HTTP Server to be created as the load balancer for the cluster.

options.text: Oracle HTTP Server integration requires a TLS/SSL certificate to enable TLS/SSL termination. End-to-end TLS/SSL encryption is not supported by the template.  The template will look for the certificate and its password in the Azure Key Vault specified here.

elements.name: ohsSkuUrnVersion
elements.label: Oracle HTTP Server image
elements.defaultValue: OHS 12.2.1.4.0 and JDK8 on Oracle Linux 7.6
elements.toolTip: Choose Oracle HTTP Server image, which is provided by Oracle, with Java and HTTP Server preinstalled.

allowedValues.label: OHS 12.2.1.4.0 and JDK8 on Oracle Linux 7.3
OHS 12.2.1.4.0 and JDK8 on Oracle Linux 7.4
OHS 12.2.1.4.0 and JDK8 on Oracle Linux 7.6

elements.name: ohsDomainName
elements.label: Oracle HTTP Server Domain name
elements.toolTip: Oracle HTTP Server Domain Name

constraints.validationMessage: [if(greater(length(steps('section_ohs').ohsDomainName), 90),'Must be less than 90 characters.', 'Value only allows alphanumeric characters, periods, underscores, hyphens and parenthesis and cannot end in a period.')]

elements.name: ohsComponentName
elements.label: Oracle HTTP Server Component name
elements.toolTip: Oracle HTTP Server Component name

constraints.validationMessage: [if(greater(length(steps('section_ohs').ohsDomainName), 90),'Must be less than 90 characters.', 'Value only allows alphanumeric characters, periods, underscores, hyphens and parenthesis and cannot end in a period.')]

elements.name: ohsNMUser
elements.label: Oracle HTTP Server NodeManager username
elements.toolTip: Oracle HTTP Server NodeManager username

constraints.validationMessage: [if(greater(length(steps('section_ohs').ohsDomainName), 90),'Must be less than 90 characters.', 'Value only allows alphanumeric characters, periods, underscores, hyphens and parenthesis and cannot end in a period.')]

elements.name: ohsNMPassword
elements.toolTip: Oracle HTTP Server NodeManager password

constraints.validationMessage: The password must contain at least 12 characters, with at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter and 1 number, and special characters are not allowed.

elements.name: ohshttpPort
elements.label: Oracle HTTP Server HTTP port
elements.toolTip: Oracle HTTP Server HTTP port

constraints.validationMessage: [if(greater(length(steps('section_ohs').ohshttpPort), 90),'Resource group names only allow up to 90 characters.', 'Resource group names only allow alphanumeric characters, periods, underscores, hyphens and parenthesis and cannot end in a period.')]

elements.name: ohshttpsPort
elements.label: Oracle HTTP Server HTTPS port
elements.toolTip: Oracle HTTP Server HTTPS port

constraints.validationMessage: [if(greater(length(steps('section_ohs').ohshttpsPort), 90),'Resource group names only allow up to 90 characters.', 'Resource group names only allow alphanumeric characters, periods, underscores, hyphens and parenthesis and cannot end in a period.')]

elements.name: oracleVaultPswd
elements.toolTip: The password to configure SSL store Oracle Vault

constraints.validationMessage: The password must contain at least 12 characters, with at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter and 1 number, and special characters are not allowed.

elements.name: ohsSSLConfigAccessOption
elements.label: How would you like to provide required configuration
elements.toolTip: Select 'Upload existing KeyStores' to use local stored KeyStores.

allowedValues.label: Use KeyStores stored in Azure Key Vault

elements.name: uploadedKeyStoreData
elements.label: TLS/SSL certificate Data file(.jks,.p12)
elements.toolTip: KeyStore for TLS/SSL configuration

elements.name: uploadedKeyStorePassword
elements.toolTip: The password for the TLS/SSL certificate Data

constraints.validationMessage: Keypass must be at least 6 characters long.

elements.name: uploadedKeyStoreType
elements.label: Type of the certificate format(JKS,PKCS12)
elements.toolTip: One of the supported KeyStore types

elements.name: keyType
elements.label: Certificate Type
elements.toolTip: One of the supported KeyStore types

elements.name: keyVaultResourceGroup
elements.label: Resource group name in current subscription containing the Key Vault
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: [if(greater(length(steps('section_ohs').ohsDomainName), 90),'Must be less than 90 characters.', 'Value only allows alphanumeric characters, periods, underscores, hyphens and parenthesis and cannot end in a period.')]

elements.name: keyVaultName
elements.label: Name of the Azure Key Vault containing secrets for the certificate for TLS/SSL Termination
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: [if(or(greater(length(steps('section_ohs').keyVaultName), 24), less(length(steps('section_ohs').keyVaultName), 3)),'Vault name must be between 3-24 alphanumeric characters. The name must begin with a letter, end with a letter or digit, and not contain consecutive hyphens.','Vault name must only contain alphanumeric characters and dashes and cannot start with a number')]

elements.name: keyVaultSSLCertDataSecretName
elements.label: The name of the secret in the specified Key Vault whose value is the TLS/SSL certificate Data
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: keyVaultSSLCertPasswordSecretName
elements.label: The name of the secret in the specified Key Vault whose value is the password for the TLS/SSL certificate
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: denyPublicTrafficForManagedServer
elements.label: Deny public traffic for managed server?
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' to deny public traffic for managed server. Configuration here for port 8002 ~ 8001 + 'node number' has a higher priority than the 'Ports and port ranges to expose' in basic blade.

options.text: Selecting 'Yes' here will cause the template to provision Load Balancer and Oracle WebLogic Administration Console using custom DNS Name (example: console.contoso.com)

elements.name: enableCustomDNS
elements.label: Configure Custom DNS Alias?
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' to configure Custom DNS Alias.

elements.name: bringDNSZone
elements.label: Use an existing Azure DNS Zone
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' to configure Custom DNS Alias based on an existing Azure DNS Zone. Select 'No' to create an Azure DNS Zone and Custom DNS Alias.

options.text: You must perform DNS Domain Delegation at your DNS Registry after deployment.
If you choose to use an existing Azure DNS Zone, you must select a user-assigned managed identity to enable the necessary configuration.

elements.name: dnszoneName
elements.label: DNS Zone Name
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers and periods to separate Domains

constraints.validationMessage: There must be between 2 and 34 labels. For example, "contoso.com" has 2 labels. Each label must contain between 1 and 63 characters. Each label must only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and dashes.

elements.name: dnsZoneResourceGroup
elements.label: Name of the resource group contains the DNS Zone in current subscription
elements.toolTip: Name of the resource group contains the DNS Zone in current subscription

constraints.validationMessage: [if(greater(length(steps('section_dnsConfiguration').existingDNSZonesSettings.dnsZoneResourceGroup), 90),'Resource group names only allow up to 90 characters.', 'Resource group names only allow alphanumeric characters, periods, underscores, hyphens and parenthesis and cannot end in a period.')]

elements.name: dnszoneAdminConsoleLabel
elements.label: Label for Oracle WebLogic Administration Console
elements.toolTip: Specify a label to generate subdomain of Oracle WebLogic Administration Console

validations.message: Each label must contain between 1 and 63 characters. Each label must only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and dashes.
Subdomain must be between 2 and 34 labels. For example, "admin.contoso.com" has 3 labels.

elements.name: dnszoneLoadBalancerLabel
elements.label: Label for Load Balancer
elements.toolTip: Specify a label to generate subdomain of Load Balancer

validations.message: Each label must contain between 1 and 63 characters. Each label must only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and dashes.
Subdomain must be between 2 and 34 labels. For example, "applications.contoso.com" has 3 labels.

options.text: This option will use Azure deployment scripts to update records to your Azure DNS Zone. You have to add at least one user-assigned identity to access Azure resources.

toolTip.userAssignedIdentity: Add user-assigned identities to grant the resource access to Azure resources.

options.text: Selecting 'Yes' here and providing the configuration will cause the template to configure the WebLogic Server to connect to the desired pre-existing database.  The database must be network accessible to the VNET and subnets created by the template.

elements.name: enableDB
elements.label: Connect to database?
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' and provide required info to configure the connection to a database.

elements.name: databaseType
elements.label: Choose database type
elements.toolTip: Choose database type

elements.name: jdbcDataSourceName
elements.label: JNDI Name
elements.toolTip: The JNDI name for the database JDBC connection

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters, numbers, and slashes (/).

elements.name: dsConnectionURL
elements.label: DataSource Connection String
elements.toolTip: The JDBC connection string for the database

constraints.validationMessage: A valid JDBC URL for the chosen database type must be provided

elements.name: dbUser
elements.label: Database username
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-128 characters long and must only contain letters, numbers, hyphen(-) and the at sign, no hyphen allowed at the beginning and the end of database username.

elements.name: dbPassword
elements.toolTip: Database Password

constraints.validationMessage: The password must be between five and 128 characters long and have at least one number.

subLabel.preValidation: Configure the connection to Azure Active Directory.

options.text: Selecting 'Yes' here and providing the configuration will cause the template to configure the connection to Azure Active Directory.

elements.name: enableAAD
elements.label: Connect to Azure Active Directory?
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' and provide required info to configure the connection to Azure Active Directory.

elements.name: aadsServerHost
elements.label: Server Host
elements.toolTip: The LDAP server host.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be a valid host name.

elements.name: aadsPublicIP
elements.label: Secure LDAP external IP address
elements.toolTip: Secure LDAP external IP address.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be a valid IP address.

elements.name: aadsPortNumber
elements.label: Port
elements.toolTip: The port number of LDAP Server, default is 636.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be numbers.

elements.name: wlsLDAPProviderName
elements.label: Provider Name
elements.toolTip: The value used for creating authentication provider name of WebLogic Server.

constraints.validationMessage: The Provider Name must be between 3 and 50 characters long and contain letters, numbers only.

elements.name: wlsLDAPPrincipal
elements.label: Principal
elements.toolTip: The Distinguished Name (DN) of the LDAP user that WebLogic Server should use to connect to the LDAP server.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be valid LDAP user distinguished name.

elements.name: wlsLDAPPrincipalPassword
elements.toolTip: The credential (usually a password) used to connect to the LDAP server.

elements.name: wlsLDAPUserBaseDN
elements.label: User Base DN
elements.toolTip: The base distinguished name (DN) of the tree in the LDAP directory that contains users.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be valid LDAP user based distinguished name.

elements.name: wlsLDAPGroupBaseDN
elements.label: Group Base DN
elements.toolTip: The base distinguished name (DN) of the tree in the LDAP directory that contains groups.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be valid LDAP group based distinguished name.

elements.name: wlsLDAPSSLCertificate
elements.label: Client certificate for TLS/SSL Configuration (.cer)
elements.toolTip: Client certificate of AAD LDAP server, used to configure the Trust Keystore to enable TLS/SSL in Oracle WebLogic Server.

subLabel.preValidation: Configure the connection to Elasticsearch and Kibana.

options.text: Selecting 'Yes' here and providing the configuration will cause the template to configure Elasticsearch and Kibana to store WLS logs.

elements.name: enableELK
elements.label: Export logs to Elasticsearch?
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' and provide required info to configure the connection to Elasticsearch.

options.text: To ensure Logstash works correctly, the selected Virtual Machines have at least 2.5GB memory.
Your selected Virtual Machines have less than 2.5GB memory to set up Elasticsearch and Kibana, please go to Basics -> Virtual machine size to change it, recommended size is Standard_A2_v2.

elements.name: elasticsearchEndpoint
elements.label: Elasticsearch endpoint URL
elements.toolTip: Elasticsearch endpoint.

validations.message: The value must be a valid endpoint.
Your selected Virtual Machines have less than 2.5GB memory to set up Elasticsearch and Kibana, please go to Basics -> Virtual machine size to change it, recommended size is Standard_A2_v2.

elements.name: elasticsearchUserName
elements.label: Elasticsearch User Name
elements.toolTip: User name of Elasticsearch account.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be valid Elasticsearch user name.

elements.name: elasticsearchPassword
elements.toolTip: Password of Elasticsearch account.

elements.name: logsToIntegrate
elements.label: WebLogic Server logs to export
elements.toolTip: The logs selected will be exported to Elasticsearch.
elements.defaultDescription: The logs selected will be exported to Elasticsearch

allowedValues.label: Node Manager Logs
allowedValues.description: Export Node Manager logs to Elasticsearch.

allowedValues.label: Standard error and output
allowedValues.description: Export standard error and output to Elasticsearch.

options.text: Selecting 'Yes' here and providing the configuration will cause the template to create a Coherence cluster, the WebLogic Domain will create a data tier configured with Managed Coherence cache servers.

elements.name: enableCoherence
elements.label: Use Coherence cache?
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' and provide required info to configure Coherence cluster.

elements.name: coherenceVMSizeSelect
elements.label: Coherence virtual machine size
elements.toolTip: The size of virtual machine for Coherence cache servers.

elements.name: numberOfCoherenceStorageInstances
elements.label: Number of Coherence cache servers
elements.toolTip: Number of Coherence cache instances, used to create virtual machines and WebLogic Managed Server.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be a valid number.

elements.name: enableCoherenceWebLocalStorage
elements.label: Coherence Web Local Storage Enabled
elements.toolTip: Specifies whether Local Storage is enabled for the Coherence*Web cluster tier
